affective.core

Class CSVEmbeddingHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • affective.core.EmbeddingHandler
      • affective.core.CSVEmbeddingHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, OptionHandler

    public class CSVEmbeddingHandler
extends EmbeddingHandler
    This class is used for handling word vector or embeddings stored in gzipped files.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1 $
    Author:
    Felipe Bravo-Marquez (fbravoma@waikato.ac.nz)
    See Also:
